headline: BioInvent–KEYTRUDA Ovarian Cancer Signal Could Be A Game Changer For Merck (MRK)
summary: BioInvent International has reported encouraging interim Phase 2a results showing that combining its BI-1808 antibody with Merck’s KEYTRUDA improved response rates and maintained a favorable safety profile in patients with recurrent ovarian cancer. This early efficacy signal in a difficult-to-treat cancer adds another potential use case for KEYTRUDA, underscoring the importance of Merck’s immuno-oncology collaborations. Next, we’ll examine how this early ovarian cancer data for the...
